price: А кад изазваше Наш гнев, Ми их казнисмо и све их потописмо,
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falammā āsafūnā intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum ajmaʿīna
